channel.title: Comments on: Reformed Baptist Theological Review update

item.title: By: Richard Barcellos
item.dc:creator: Richard Barcellos
item.description: Tom, send me an email at rb@rbap.net and I will send you the review article. It is part I of a two-part review.
item.content:encoded: Tom, send me an email at rb@rbap.net and I will send you the review article. It is part I of a two-part review.

item.title: By: Tom Wells
item.dc:creator: Tom Wells
item.description:
Richard: Greetings from an old friend! I see you will have an article on my Sabbath book. Could you send me a copy of it by Email? I'd appreciate it a good deal. On a different note: I'm trying to work out an arrnagement with Errol Hulse to visit you before long.
Thanks! Tom
item.content:encoded:
Richard: Greetings from an old friend! I see you will have an article on my Sabbath book. Could you send me a copy of it by Email? I’d appreciate it a good deal. On a different note: I’m trying to work out an arrnagement with Errol Hulse to visit you before long.

Thanks! Tom
